title: Quality Conversation with Christopher Mastropietro #2 - Tunisia the Beautiful, Pirsig, MOQ, Dialogos
description:
I was fortunate to have another Quality conversation with the brilliant Christopher Mastropietro. We have more in common than love of Pirsig...We now share the experience of a special place. 

Oh, you may be surprised to know we also talked about Covid
...and cigarettes.
